name: Carrots from Heaven
description:
Carrots from Heaven

You are a rabbit, one single rabbit with the ability to cure the world of the evil miasma with your carrots, super powered carrot power. Can you defeat all the waves of angry possessed gorillas? 

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D to move around
  • Hold left mouse to shoot

Credits: 

A game by Snuti

Soundtrack composed by Thortrillion Tomsborg (https://soundcloud.com/thortrillion) 

Asset packs used for the models:

  • Low Poly Ultimate Pack asset pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/low-poly-animated-an...
  • Low poly animated animals asset pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-ultimate-pack-54733
  • Icons: https://game-icon.net/

Made in Unity 3D
